product_name: Zoic Black Market Plaid Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Light, strethy and stylish enough for the post-ride brewery, the men's ZOIC Black Market Plaid Bike Shorts feature an inner liner with a lightly padded chamois for extra comfort on the bike. 4-way-stretch outer shorts give you full freedom of movement and fall just above the knee. Liner shorts are polyester/spandex mesh fabric for comfortable stretch, breathability and wicking. Plush elastic waistband on liner shorts feels soft against the skin; inner leg openings feature grippy logos to hold liner in place. Outer shorts feature a nylon webbing belt with snap buckle, waistband with rip-and-stick closure, and zip fly. Tech pocket with cord port holds a phone or music player. Also features front hand pockets, 2 leg zip pockets, and 1 hidden back zip pocket. ZOIC Black Market Plaid Bike Shorts have a gusset inseam panel that allows full freedom of movement and reduces saddle hang-up.
